resources.string: Do you want to allow the app to always run in the background?
This app collects location data to enable [Tracks] and [Background Bluetooth Search] even if the app is closed or not in use
Do you want to allow the app to access phone calls, call logs and contacts?
This app will get phone call information, communication record or SMS to enable the functions of "call reminder" and "message reminder", even if the app is already in the background.
